summary: The implementation comprehensively addresses all requirements for admin authentication and subscription management dashboard. Backend includes isOwner field in UserProfile with proper access control, owner status checking function, and full CRUD operations for subscription plans restricted to owner access. Frontend implements admin dashboard with subscription plan management UI, owner badge display in profile, and conditional admin navigation link. Migration properly handles the new isOwner field. All acceptance criteria appear to be met with appropriate evidence in the diff.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin function setUserOwnerStatus() that allows admins to set owner status for any user
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest specifies owner status must be set manually in backend or via initialization, not through a general admin function. The constraint states 'Owner status must be set manually in the backend or via initialization, not self-assigned through UI', but does not request an admin API for setting owner status.

hallucinated_features.description: ProfileCard component with comprehensive profile display including subscription status, tier, and admin dashboard access button
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-19 only requests owner badge/indicator display and admin dashboard link in owner profile. The detailed subscription status and tier display in ProfileCard goes beyond the requested owner profile features.
